markdownRemark.html:
These are some of the characteristics I think are important in a Senior software engineer:

  • Responsible - worthy of trust and respect
  • Courteous - gracious and polite
  • Good listener - willing to hear what others think
  • Opinionated - can make decisions
  • Has integrity - does the right thing
  • Mentor - can help others learn
  • Teachable - understands they still have more to learn

This list is not intended to be exhaustive but these are some of the top characteristics I think of when I think of senior engineers. You may have others or disagree with some of mine. Feel free to leave a comment.

frontmatter.title: What Makes a Senior Engineer
frontmatter.description: My ideas on the characteristics of a senior engineer
